description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年政治人物，汉室宗亲。曾任扬州刺史，后与袁术、孙策等军事势力在江东地区发生冲突并最终败亡。
description.en: A politician and member of the imperial clan during the late Eastern Han dynasty of China. He served as the Inspector of Yang Province and clashed with warlords like Yuan Shu and Sun Ce in the Jiangdong region, ultimately being defeated.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇之兄，东汉末年官员，曾任兖州刺史。
description.en: Older brother of Liu Yao, an official in the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as the Inspector of Yan Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇与刘岱之父，曾任山阳太守。
description.en: Father of Liu Yao and Liu Dai, served as the Grand Administrator of Shanyang.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇的伯父，东汉时期官至太尉。
description.en: Liu Yao's paternal uncle, who reached the high position of Grand Marshal (Taiwei) during the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，为孙吴政权的奠基者之一。他击败了刘繇，平定了江东地区。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and one of the founders of the state of Eastern Wu. He defeated Liu Yao and conquered the Jiangdong region.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀。起初将刘繇迎至曲阿，后因刘繇驱逐其部下而与之交恶。
description.en: A warlord during the late Eastern Han dynasty. He initially welcomed Liu Yao to Qu'a but later became his enemy after Liu Yao expelled his subordinates.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年武将。曾短暂效力于刘繇，但未受重用。后被孙策俘虏并归降，成为其麾下重要将领。
description.en: A military general in the late Eastern Han dynasty. He briefly served Liu Yao but was not given significant responsibilities. He was later captured by and surrendered to Sun Ce, becoming one of his key generals.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名士，以善于品评人物著称。曾为刘繇的谋士，在其兵败后为其分析形势并提供建议。
description.en: A famous scholar during the late Eastern Han dynasty, known for his character appraisals. He served as an advisor to Liu Yao, analyzing the situation and offering advice after his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年人物。初依附刘繇，奉命增援朱皓时却将其杀害并夺取豫章郡，后被刘繇讨伐并败亡。
description.en: A figure in the late Eastern Han dynasty. He initially aligned with Liu Yao, but when sent to reinforce Zhu Hao, he killed him and seized Yuzhang Commandery. He was subsequently attacked and defeated by Liu Yao.

description.zh-cn: 东汉名将朱俊之子。被朝廷任命为豫章太守，后被刘繇派来增援的笮融所杀。
description.en: Son of the famous Eastern Han general Zhu Jun. He was appointed by the Han court as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang but was killed by Ze Rong, who had been sent by Liu Yao as reinforcements.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的十三州之一，州治原在寿春，后因战乱，刘繇在曲阿建立统治。
description.en: One of the thirteen provinces of the Eastern Han dynasty. Its capital was originally in Shouchun, but due to wartime chaos, Liu Yao established his administration in Qu'a.

description.zh-cn: 孙策的舅舅。原为袁术部下，奉命迎接刘繇，后因刘繇忌惮孙氏势力而被驱逐。
description.en: Sun Ce's maternal uncle. Originally a subordinate of Yuan Shu, he was ordered to welcome Liu Yao but was later expelled due to Liu Yao's fear of the Sun clan's growing influence.

description.zh-cn: 孙策的堂兄。原为袁术部下，与吴景一同迎接刘繇，后同被驱逐。
description.en: Sun Ce's older cousin. Originally a subordinate of Yuan Shu, he welcomed Liu Yao along with Wu Jing and was later expelled with him.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年荆州牧，汉室宗亲。刘繇兵败后，曾与他联合对抗袁术。
description.en: Governor of Jing Province in the late Eastern Han dynasty and a member of the imperial clan. After Liu Yao's defeat, he allied with him against Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮的叔父。曾被袁术任命为豫章太守，后被刘繇与朱皓的联军赶走。
description.en: Zhuge Liang's paternal uncle. He was appointed by Yuan Shu as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang but was driven out by the allied forces of Liu Yao and Zhu Hao.

description.zh-cn: 一篇据称由诸葛亮所写的表文，其中以刘繇、王朗等人为例，批评他们坐论空谈导致孙策坐大，以此劝谏后主刘禅。
description.en: A memorial allegedly written by Zhuge Liang, which uses figures like Liu Yao and Wang Lang as examples of indecisive leaders whose inaction allowed Sun Ce to grow powerful, serving as a cautionary tale for Emperor Liu Shan.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相。在其《后出师表》中对刘繇有负面评价。
description.en: Chancellor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period. He gave a negative evaluation of Liu Yao in his 'Later Memorial on Dispatching the Troops'.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉第二位皇帝，诸葛亮《后出师表》的进谏对象。
description.en: The second emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, to whom Zhuge Liang addressed the 'Later Memorial on Dispatching the Troops'.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇之子。
description.en: Son of Liu Yao.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇是刘舆的儿子。
description.en: Liu Yao is the son of Liu Yu.

description.zh-cn: 刘岱是刘舆的儿子。
description.en: Liu Dai is the son of Liu Yu.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇是刘岱的弟弟。
description.en: Liu Yao is the younger brother of Liu Dai.

description.zh-cn: 刘宠是刘繇的伯父。
description.en: Liu Chong is Liu Yao's paternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 刘基是刘繇的儿子。
description.en: Liu Ji is the son of Liu Yao.

position.zh-cn: 刺史, 州牧, 振武将军
position.en: Inspector, Provincial Governor, General of Military Courage

description.zh-cn: 194年，刘繇被朝廷任命为扬州刺史，后加晋为州牧、振武将军。
description.en: In 194, Liu Yao was appointed by the Han court as the Inspector of Yang Province, and was later promoted to Provincial Governor and General of Military Courage.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇因畏惧袁术及孙氏势力的扩张，驱逐了袁术的部下吴景和孙贲，导致双方关系破裂，袁术随后派兵攻打刘繇的部将。
description.en: Fearing the expansion of Yuan Shu and the Sun clan's power, Liu Yao expelled Yuan Shu's subordinates Wu Jing and Sun Ben, causing their relationship to rupture. Yuan Shu subsequently dispatched troops to attack Liu Yao's generals.

description.zh-cn: 孙策率军渡江，击败了刘繇的部队，并最终迫使刘繇放弃根据地逃往豫章。
description.en: Sun Ce led his army across the Yangtze River, defeated Liu Yao's forces, and ultimately forced Liu Yao to abandon his base and flee to Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇因忌惮孙氏和袁术的势力而将吴景驱逐出曲阿。
description.en: Due to his fear of the influence of the Sun clan and Yuan Shu, Liu Yao expelled Wu Jing from Qu'a.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇因忌惮孙氏和袁术的势力而将孙贲驱逐出曲阿。
description.en: Due to his fear of the influence of the Sun clan and Yuan Shu, Liu Yao expelled Sun Ben from Qu'a.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇兵败于孙策后，采纳许劭的建议退守豫章，并与荆州牧刘表联合对抗袁术。
description.en: After being defeated by Sun Ce, Liu Yao took Xu Shao's advice to retreat to Yuzhang and allied with Liu Biao, the Governor of Jing Province, to resist Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈在义救孔融后，南下投奔刘繇，但未受重用。
description.en: After rescuing Kong Rong, Taishi Ci went south to join Liu Yao, but was not given significant responsibilities.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇不识太史慈的能力，只派他做侦查工作，未能善用其才。
description.en: Liu Yao did not recognize Taishi Ci's abilities and only assigned him to reconnaissance duties, failing to make good use of his talents.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇兵败后，太史慈被孙策俘虏，随后归降并为其效力。
description.en: After Liu Yao's defeat, Taishi Ci was captured by Sun Ce, to whom he subsequently surrendered and served.

description.zh-cn: 许劭在刘繇兵败后，作为其幕僚为其分析局势并提供战略建议。
description.en: After Liu Yao's defeat, Xu Shao served as his advisor, analyzing the situation and providing strategic advice.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇出兵协助朝廷任命的豫章太守朱皓，将袁术任命的太守诸葛玄赶走。
description.en: Liu Yao dispatched troops to assist Zhu Hao, the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang appointed by the Han court, and drove out Zhuge Xuan, who was appointed by Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 刘繇出兵协助朱皓，对抗诸葛玄以争夺豫章太守之位。
description.en: Liu Yao sent troops to assist Zhu Hao in fighting against Zhuge Xuan for the position of Grand Administrator of Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 笮融奉刘繇之命增援朱皓，却趁机诱杀了朱皓，夺取了豫章郡。
description.en: Under Liu Yao's orders, Ze Rong went to reinforce Zhu Hao, but instead, he lured and killed Zhu Hao, seizing control of Yuzhang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 在笮融杀害朱皓后，刘繇起兵讨伐笮融，最终将其击败。
description.en: After Ze Rong killed Zhu Hao, Liu Yao raised an army to attack Ze Rong and eventually defeated him.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮撰写了《后出师表》。
description.en: Zhuge Liang wrote the 'Later Memorial on Dispatching the Troops'.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮在《后出师表》中以刘繇等人为例，劝谏刘禅要吸取历史教训，避免重蹈覆辙。
description.en: In the 'Later Memorial on Dispatching the Troops', Zhuge Liang used Liu Yao and others as examples to advise Liu Shan to learn from historical lessons and avoid repeating past mistakes.
